summary: Code imports functions from "core4" and "simpleStorage", creates a local database with key-value pairs of characters to matchNeighbor results, and then stores it in the "simpleStorage".

details.comment: Code imports functions from "core4" and "simpleStorage", creates a local database with key-value pairs of characters to matchNeighbor results, and then stores it in the "simpleStorage".
details.content:
from core4 import matchNeighbor
from simpleStorage import storeAList
# now you can make a local database.
#    k=chr(k0)
v={chr(k0):matchNeighbor(chr(k0)) for k0 in range(ord("a"),1+ord("z"))}
print(v)
storeAList(v)
